de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.style

Interface StylingPolicy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassStylingPolicy, SingleObjectsStylingPolicy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterStylingPolicy, SegmentsStylingPolicy

    public interface StylingPolicy
    Styling policy. Implementations must implement either ClassStylingPolicy or SingleObjectsStylingPolicy interfaces, as most visualizers will only support these known interfaces.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColorForDBID(DBIDRef id)
      Get the color for an individual object.

    • Method Detail

      • getColorForDBID

        int getColorForDBID(DBIDRef id)
        Get the color for an individual object. Note: if possible, use a class styling policy which can optimize better.
        Parameters:
        id - Object ID
        Returns:
        Color value
